scripts._test-cover: npm run build && istanbul cover node_modules/jasmine/bin/jasmine.js JASMINE_CONFIG_PATH=jasmine.json --include-all-sources --print none
scripts.test-cover-summary: npm run _test-cover && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/coverage-remaped-summary.txt -t text-summary && type coverage\coverage-remaped-summary.txt
scripts.test-cover-detail: npm run _test-cover && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/coverage-remaped.txt -t text && type coverage\coverage-remaped.txt
scripts.test-cover-report: npm run _test-cover && remap-istanbul -i coverage/coverage.json -o coverage/lcov-report-remapped -t html && start coverage/lcov-report-remapped/index.html
